name: Soldier of Fortune II: Double Helix
description: This installer for the Gold edition, version 1.03
notes:
Do not launch the game when the installer finishes. The game wants to start in a weird resolution and some systems will go black with no input from the keyboard.

After install start Wine Configuration from the side menu and set the virtual desktop to 1024x768. This is also a good way to test whether the virtual desktop is actually working.

Verify that the game starts in desktop mode.

To enable wide screen resolutions download the patch files and follow the instructions.

https://www.moddb.com/games/soldier-of-fortune-ii/downloads/sof2-widescreen-fov-and-hud-fix

When done go into Wine Configuration again and disable the virtual desktop. Then go into the Lutris game configuration / Runner options and disable the virtual desktop there too and remove the resolution from the input field.

Save and run the game.
